creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Deprecate listeners:
- Distribution Graph (alpha) => It was always in Alpha , I think we have now far better listeners for reporting than this one
- Spline Visualizer => It is not really user friendly and I am not sure it is useful.
